description:
The school`s festival is coming soon, but the Tesagure Club has never officially participated. Koharu`s enthusiasm for somehow getting involved spurs a discussion and what to do is almost decided for them as the band club suddenly can`t participate, but one of their members asks Yua to represent them. And before they know it, the Tesagure Club is on stage, cracking jokes and performing a song that encapsulates their club.
Source: crunchyroll
